mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, job_no, job_status, job_title, member_id, job_date from job order by job_no desc) where rnum >=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into job values( (select (case when max(job_no) is null then 0 else max(job_no) end) from job)+1,#{member_id},#{job_title},#{job_img},#{job_contents},sysdate, '0',sysdate,sysdate,#{job_addr},#{job_tel})
